onboarding.title: Soo dhowow
onboarding.subtitle: Aqoonsi ammaan ah adigoo adeegsanaya cod iyo liveness.

registration.title: Samee akoon
registration.terms: Haddaad sii waddo, waad ogoshahay habaynta xogta biometric.

voiceEnrollment.title: Diiwaangelinta codka
voiceEnrollment.subtitle: Diiwaangeli 3 tijaabo.
voiceEnrollment.instructions: Ku hadal si cad meel aan buuq lahayn.

liveness.title: Liveness
liveness.instructions: Dhex dhig wajiga oo raac tilmaamaha.

consent.title: Oggolaanshaha biometric
consent.message: Waxaan ka shaqaynaynaa codkaaga iyo sawirradaada si aan u xaqiijino aqoonsiga.
